topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54838fac63687232ef530100#post_54838fac63687232ef530100
I'm not disappointed that I watched it. I believe 02 to be a stronger season as a whole than Adventure, but there were a lot of things in 02 that rubbed me the wrong way. [spoiler]Reusing Vamdemon/Myotismon as a villain just felt really lazy to me. And there were a lot of side plots that were pointless. Like the whole Daemon deal in the Human World.[/spoiler]
All in all. It was good and I can see why kids liked it.
